name: Chili Chicken Ramen
description: Spicy ramen broth with grilled chicken, egg, and spring onions.

name: Shoyu Ramen
description: Classic soy-based ramen with marinated chicken and bamboo shoots.

name: Pork Belly Ramen
description: Rich tonkotsu broth with slow-cooked pork belly and a soft-boiled egg.

name: Spicy Miso Ramen
description: Bold miso broth with minced chicken, bean sprouts, and corn.

name: Seafood Ramen
description: Light seafood broth with prawns, squid, and seasonal greens.

name: Vegetable Ramen
description: Clear vegetable broth with tofu, mushrooms, and bok choy.

name: Tantanmen Ramen
description: Spicy and nutty ramen with minced pork and chili oil.

name: Duck Ramen
description: Rich duck broth with sliced duck breast and bamboo shoots.
